level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This subchapter shall apply to claims arising between April 20, 1999 and December 31, 2005, and to contracts executed and in effect between April 20, 1999 and December 31, 2005.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-244
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-244, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-323.01.
